name: Roger Harper's Cheesy Nightmare
description:
This game is a text-based story adventure created using Node.js and Javascript.

You play as the cricketer Roger Harper. The plot behind this game is that you and your brother "Mark" are partying at a local club. When suddenly he starts talking about strange cheese from France. After insisting that it's perfectly fine both Roger and Mark Harper decide to test if for themselves. Unknown to them, however, is that the cheese isn't normal and they end up in a strange cheese-induced realm.

How will you fare?

[ Basic Commands ]

  • Walk
  • Move
  • Grab
  • Use
  • Enter
  • Take
  • Fight
  • Kick
  • Open

** Made for University of Portsmouth's GameJam Event **

(VirusTotal Scan: https://v.gd/X4IwoU)
